title: something about
subtitle: something about
content: *encapsulated = express the essential features dasdasdof (something) succinctly* Even now and then you find yourself using a technology for a fair period of time, but, somehow, you're pretty able to admit that you don't really know how it works under the hood.\ You probably got a vague idea of what is happening down there, but not something you can put your finger on or explain it to a five years old. Before my impostor syndrome kicks in, I'll assume that it happens to anyone, not just to myself, and that the associated itchy feeling is something we all experience now and then. I started this blog as a way of documenting those sporadic, yet fruitfully questions and, most importantly, their answers in a form that can shorten the long path of "I shouldn't be working in this field" statements. Hope you'll find here something that will make you more informed, yet keep you hungry and foolish. ### Enjoy!
